short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very useful chrome extension to quickly populate Title, Description and Tags of YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension helps you to quickly reuse content (Title, Description and Tags) of the previously saved videos and shorts on your machine. Most of the time, Youtubers make similar kind of videos and hence write a lot of similar details used previously in older videos. This extension facilitates you and helps save a lot of time by avoiding going to and fro in different video detail pages. 

Features:
=> Reuse Title 
=> Reuse Description 
=> Reuse / Append Tags of multiple videos 
=> Manage the videos/content that you want to reuse
=> Share data across channels 

At present, you will be allowed to reuse data of 50 videos. In case you exceed the limit then you can remove an already added video from the list to use the content of a new video. 

Drop your Suggestions for New Features / Feedback / Comments.

Cheers!!!
